summary: With their employer bankrupt, servants scheme to marry maid Millie to a rich husband. But Frank Sinatra lives across the street...
cast: Michèle Morgan|Jack Haley|Frank Sinatra|Leon Errol|Marcy McGuire|Victor Borge|Mary Wickes|Elisabeth Risdon|Barbara Hale|Mel Tormé|Paul Hartman|Grace Hartman|Dooley Wilson|Ivy Scott|Robert Andersen|Paul Bradley|Ralph Brooks|Tanis Chandler|Jack Chefe|Jay Eaton|Rex Evans|Edward Fielding|George Ford|Jack Gargan|Dick Gordon|Buddy Gorman|Rita Gould|Louis Hightower|Daun Kennedy|King Kennedy|Perc Launders|Stanley Logan|Ola Lorraine|Wilbur Mack|Dorothy Malone|Harold Miller|Hans Moebus|Bert Moorhouse|Edmund Mortimer|Shirley O'Hara|Fred Rapport|Elaine Riley|Cyril Ring|Cosmo Sardo|Jeffrey Sayre|Larry Steers|Drake Thornton|Russell Wade
title: Cada vez más alto
